name: EXTINCTION ALIEN INVASION DEMO
description:
Extinction Alien Invasion is an arcade shooter with elements of RPG, inspired by games like: Shadowgrounds, Alien Breed and Alien Swarm. In the game you will control a mercenary at the beginning of an alien invasion doing everything to protect the human race.

Annihilate waves of aliens, build your base, improve your mercenary, do it all with a sound track bathed in rock.

Key Features: 

-> Cooperative gameplay for two players.

-> Full joystick support.

-> Dynamic combat system

->Several skills for you to play in your own way. (final version)

->Over 50 weapons to collect.

-> Are you finding the game easy?! How about customizing your difficulty?!With mods system is possible, change enemies' damage, health, attack properties, speed and more. ( final version)

->Various types of enemies.

->Several items to build during the waves.

->Soundtrack bathed to much rock.

How to Play :

w.a,s,d -> Move your character

right mouse -> aim

left mouse -> shoot

r -> reload weapon

t/ mouse scroll -> change weapon

g -> throw grenade

e -> interact with objects

f-> turn flashlight

left shift -> run

space -> roll
